snippet: Mr. Harris joined the Delfonics soul group in the early 1970s and later recorded the R&B hit single “Love Won’t Let Me Wait.”
abstract: Major Harris, American soul singer and former member of the Delfonics, dies at age 65.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Harris joined the Delfonics soul group in the early 1970s and later recorded the R&B hit single “Love Won’t Let Me Wait.”

headline.seo: Major Harris of the Delfonics Dies at 65
headline.main: Major Harris, Soul Singer With Delfonics, Dies at 65
headline.print_headline: Major Harris, 65, Soul Singer With Delfonics
